fog_start.title: Fog Start
fog_start.description: The distance from the player that the fog will begin to appear. 'fog_start' must be less than or equal to 'fog_end'.

fog_end.title: Fog End
fog_end.description: The distance from the player that the fog will become fully opaque. 'fog_end' must be greater than or equal to 'fog_start'.

fog_color.title: Fog Color
fog_color.description: The color that the fog will take on.

render_distance_type.title: Render Distance Type
render_distance_type.description: Determines how distance value is used. Fixed distance is measured in blocks. Dynamic distance is multiplied by the current render distance.

transition_fog.title: Transition Fog
transition_fog.description: Additional fog data which will slowly transition to the distance fog of current biome.

init_fog.title: Initial Fog
init_fog.description: Initial fog that will slowly transition into water distance fog of the biome when player goes into water.

fog_color.title: Fog Color
fog_color.description: The color that the fog will take on.

fog_start.title: Fog Start
fog_start.description: The distance from the player that the fog will begin to appear. 'fog_start' must be less than or equal to 'fog_end'.

fog_end.title: Fog End
fog_end.description: The distance from the player that the fog will become fully opaque. 'fog_end' must be greater than or equal to 'fog_start'.

render_distance_type.title: Render Distance Type
render_distance_type.description: Determines how distance value is used. Fixed distance is measured in blocks. Dynamic distance is multiplied by the current render distance.

min_percent.title: Minimum Percent
min_percent.description: The minimum progress of fog transition.

mid_seconds.title: Midpoint Seconds
mid_seconds.description: The time takes to reach certain progress('mid_percent') of fog transition.

mid_percent.title: Midpoint Percent
mid_percent.description: The progress of fog transition after 'mid_seconds' seconds.

max_seconds.title: Maximum Seconds
max_seconds.description: Total amount of time takes to complete fog transition.

max_density.title: Maximum Density
max_density.description: The maximum amount of opaqueness that the ground fog will take on. A value from [0.0, 1.0].

max_density_height.title: Maximum Density Height
max_density_height.description: The height in blocks that the ground fog will become it's maximum density.

zero_density_height.title: Zero Density Height
zero_density_height.description: The height in blocks that the ground fog will be completely transparent and begin to appear. This value needs to be at least 1 higher than `max_density_height`.

uniform.title: Uniform
uniform.description: When set to true, the density will be uniform across all heights.

absorption.title: Absorption
absorption.description: Proportion of light that is absorbed (lost) per block.

scattering.title: Scattering
scattering.description: Proportion of light that is scattered per block.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

minecraft:fog_settings.title: Fog Settings
minecraft:fog_settings.description: The definition of a single fog.

description.title: Description
description.description: The identifying description of this fog settings.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for these fog settings. The identifier must include a namespace.

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The distance fog settings for different camera locations.

air.title: Air
air.description: The fog settings when the camera is in the air.

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: The fog settings for when the camera is in the air with active weather (rain, snow, etc..).

water.title: Water
water.description: The fog settings when the camera is in water.

lava.title: Lava
lava.description: The fog settings when the camera is in lava.

lava_resistance.title: Lava Resistance
lava_resistance.description: The fog settings when the camera is in lava and the player has the lava resistance effect active.

powder_snow.title: Powder Snow
powder_snow.description: The fog settings when the camera is inside a Powder Snow block.

density.title: Density
density.description: The density settings for different camera locations.

air.title: Air
air.description: Fog density values as light passes through air blocks.

water.title: Water
water.description: Fog density values as light passes through water blocks.

lava.title: Lava
lava.description: Fog density values as light passes through lava blocks.

lava_resistance.title: Lava Resistance
lava_resistance.description: Fog density values as light passes through lava blocks while the player has lava resistance.

media_coefficients.title: Media Coefficients
media_coefficients.description: The coefficient settings for the volumetric fog in different blocks.

air.title: Air
air.description: Fog coefficient values while light passes through air.

water.title: Water
water.description: Fog coefficient values while light passes through water.

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.description: Fog coefficient values while light passes through clouds.
